2.「時見のカギを 慰霊碑に納めたいとは| どういうことなのですか！？: What do you mean you want to put Timeseer's|Key in the cenotaph!

4.「時見のカギは エテーネ王家の象徴。| まさか 王制を廃止しようなどと| 思って: Timeseer's Key is a symbol of the royal family|of Ethene. You are not thinking of abolishing|the monarchy, are you?

5.「そんなことをすれば| 今は亡き クオード陛下が| どれだけ おなげきになること: How much more would the late His Majesty Quard|have been appalled by such a thing!

9.<center>姉……さん…………。|どうか…… エテーネ王国を……|新しい未来: Sister please lead Ethene Kingdom into a new|future. ...

13.「メ メレアーデ様！！| おぐしの色が 以前のものに 戻っております！: Mereade! Your comb has returned to its former|color!

14.「こ……これは！！| クオード陛下の ご遺志が起こした奇跡に| ちがいない！: This... this! This must be the miracle of His|Majesty Quard's will!

16.「時見のカギを 慰霊碑に納めたいと言ったのは| 私たちが 時見のチカラに頼らずに: I said I wanted to place Timeseer's Key in the|cenotaph to show that we will live without|relying on the power of Tokimi.

17.「それは きっと クオードの望んだ| 新しい未来へ 歩みだすために必要なことです: It is surely what Quard needs to Step Into the|Future that he wants. You understand,|Theodort.

18.「先ほどの非礼……どうか お許しください。| あなた様のご意志は クオード陛下の: Please forgive me for my earlier insolence.|Your will is the legacy of His Majesty Quard.|I, too, have made it clear to you.

19.「このセオドルト。一命を賭して| エテーネ王国の未来のため メレアーデ様の| お: This Theodort. I will risk my life for the|future of the Ethene Kingdom, and I will be|your help, Mereade-sama!

20.「取り急ぎ 慰霊碑の完成を目指さなくては。| 手配は すでに 済ませておりますの:
We need to finish the cenotaph as soon as|possible. The arrangements have already been|made, so all we have to do now is get to work|
|on the placement!

21.「わかりました。慰霊碑が完成したら| クオードの死を 国民に伝えるつもりですので: I understand. When the memorial is completed,|I will inform the public of Quard's death, so|please prepare that as well.

23.セオドルトの指揮のもと 大急ぎで|慰霊碑の建造が 進められていった。: Under Theodort's leadership, the construction|of the cenotaph proceeded with great haste.

24.ほどなくして 慰霊碑は完成し|そのお披露目の式典が 国民を集めて|おこなわれるこ: Soon after, the cenotaph was completed and a|ceremony was held to unveil it to the public.

25.式典の場で メレアーデによって|クオードの死を告げられた 王国の民は|動揺を隠す: By Mereade on the occasion of the ceremony|The people of the kingdom were told of Quard's death|I couldn't hide my upset

26.時見のチカラに頼ることなく 自分たちの足で|新たな未来へ歩みだそうと 強く語る|:
The sight of Mereade, who spoke strongly of|the need to move toward a new future on their|own feet without relying on Tokimi's power,|
|restored hope to the group.

32.「……皆さん自身の足で| 輝かしい未来へと 歩みだしましょう。| エテーネ王国よ: ...Let's all walk into the bright future on|our own two feet. Eternity, Ethene Kingdom!
